shortcuts.strgEnter: Either focuses the commit message when entered inside the editor or commits the changes when entered inside the commit message
shortcuts.escape: Focuses the cancel button when pressed inside the commit message

errors.pattern: The path must start with "/", must not contain "\" and must not end with space
errors.empty: The path must not be empty

errors.pattern: The filename must not contain "/" or "\" and must not end with space
errors.empty: The filename must not be empty

edit.subtitle: File Editor
edit.notEditable: This file type cannot be edited inside SCM-Manager
edit.revisionChanged: The latest revision has changed. Copy your changes and refresh the page to get the latest version of the file.

upload.title: Upload file
upload.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your files here or click here to select your files

4uRaXHBhs1.description: A file could not be uploaded correctly.

AnRacIBuV1.description: The commit message has to be specified as a form part with name 'message'.

CIRacPIOH1.description: A form part is missing the Content-Disposition header or it has no value for 'filename'.

AuRneG3vO1.description: The change was prevented by other plugins.
